categories: Rap Line 6mm Protect Pro Dry Rope
description:
The Rap Line is a tag line with a dynamic safety reserve in case of an unexpected fall. Aramid fibres, braided into the sheath and core, have high cut-resistant properties for great durability when rappelling over edges. In the event of a fall, these aramid fibres will break, allowing the core of the rope to absorb the impact. Great for glacier travel, hauling, and full-length rappels.Made from a combination of high-strength polyamide and aramid.Designed to be used as a tag line, for hauling and rappelling.Pro Dry finish makes this rope durably water repellent and dirt resistant.Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying, absorbs virtually no water and resists freezing.3D lap coiled so you can use it straight away without kinking or tangling.Tested for two falls used as a twin rope with CE EN 892.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Edelrid Rap Line 6mm Protect Pro Dry Rope
